summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North and East 45th Street, from Stone Way to University Way, by constructing a street lighting system, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7624 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
